name: Android Växa
description:
A little game a made for GrowJam. It's really simple and short.

All the art, programming, sounds, music and other assets were made by me. The music was made in GarageBand.

Controls: Up/A to jump, Down/X to swing, Left & Right Arrow Keys / Left Stick to move, Enter/Right Trigger to dash, F1 to switch controls, F2 to switch fullscreen mode.

This game was made in eight days and has many bugs, glitches and cuts so lots will feel missing.
